title: Steeltoe Cloud Native .NET Microservices Workshop  Workshop
content:
Pivotal Platform Architecture helps companies learn how to solve IT and engineering challenges. We encourage you to explore our workshops. Build the future with Pivotal!  Steeltoe Cloud Native .NET Microservices Workshop Workshop
  Workshop Conceitos Advanced Features of Steeltoe Workshop Demos Introduction & Credentials Setup Environment Environment Variables User Provided Services with Steeltoe Include Steeltoe Actuators and Create a Custom Health Check Push Microservice to PASW App Manager with Management Actuators Steeltoe Dynamic Logging Continuing Your .NET Cloud Native Journey

title: Conceitos
content: Conceitos Aprenda o básico, entenda arquiteturas e preencha os principais conceitos por trás do workshop.

title: Demos
content: Demos Construa arquiteturas e teste os principais conceitos por trás do workshop.
